text: Pilar Campoy (born 6 October 1990) is an Argentine field hockey player and part of the Argentina national team. She was part of the Argentine team at the 2014–15 Women's FIH Hockey World League where she won a gold medal,http://www.fieldhockey.com/archives/index.php/2015/33-december/717-news- for-14-december-2015 and at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro. On club level she played for Club Náutico Hacoaj in Argentina. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Las Leonas players Category:Olympic field hockey players of Argentina Category:Argentine female field hockey players Category:Field hockey players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Expatriate field hockey players Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:South American Games gold medalists for Argentina Category:South American Games medalists in field hockey Category:Competitors at the 2018 South American Games Category:Club de Campo Villa de Madrid players
title: Pilar Campoy
